status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.body:
Hello, Somehow your Core CLI update wasn't successful. Can you Try deleting ".appcelerator" folder and try reinstall CLI.
Please run,

"npm install appcelerator -g"

and "appc setup"

Reply with your findings, Thanks.
